column4: I don't really know what I am expecting... miracle maybe... but here I go:
all of my important files have vanished... I doubt anyone can tell me how to recover them, but can anyone at least give me an idea of how?
my entire music collection (most of which I still have the physical media for somewhere), my entire photo collection (no backups, lots of memories)
so what did you do that may have lost all your files? Where they all under /home/?
